mapper.insert: insert into spring_contact (id, company, title, username, email, web, fax, qq, webchat, mobile, tel, sort_code, deleted_status, created_user_id, created_by, created_on, created_ip, updated_user_id, updated_by, updated_on, updated_ip) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{web,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{webchat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deletedStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update spring_contact set company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, web = #{web,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, webchat = #{webchat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_code = #{sortCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deleted_status = #{deletedStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_user_id = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_on = #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_ip = #{createdIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_user_id = #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_on = #{updatedOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_ip = #{updatedIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, company, title, username, email, web, fax, qq, webchat, mobile, tel, sort_code, deleted_status, created_user_id, created_by, created_on, created_ip, updated_user_id, updated_by, updated_on, updated_ip from spring_contact where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, company, title, username, email, web, fax, qq, webchat, mobile, tel, sort_code, deleted_status, created_user_id, created_by, created_on, created_ip, updated_user_id, updated_by, updated_on, updated_ip from spring_contact

select id, company, title, username, email, web, fax, qq, webchat, mobile, tel, sort_code, deleted_status, created_user_id, created_by, created_on, created_ip, updated_user_id, updated_by, updated_on, updated_ip from spring_contact where deleted_status=0
and title like concat(#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and company like concat(#{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and username like concat(#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and email like concat(#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and web like concat(#{web,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and fax like concat(#{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and qq like concat(#{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and webchat like concat(#{webchat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and mobile like concat(#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and tel like concat(#{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
